outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this project is to facilitate a forum of discussion and analysis among specialists from the Ministries of Foreign Relations and the Ministries of Defense/Public Safety regarding the theme of cluster munitions, aimed at prohibiting the use, production, transfer and stockpiling of cluster munitions that cause unacceptable harm to civilians

project_descr: Conferencia Latinoamericana sobre Municiones de Racimo
project_title: Conferencia Latinoamericana sobre Municiones de Racimo
